itunes:summary:
Ryan Kavanaugh of Triller talks about their upcoming fights (and Metallica concert) in Arlington, TX, the future of the Triller app, the new styles of fights Triller is going to be premiering in the near future (including a triangle-shaped ring), and the future of fight streaming.
